title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption through acts of common decency.
rt_quote: Steeped in old-fashioned storytelling and given evergreen humanity by Morgan Freeman and Tim Robbins, The Shawshank Redemption chronicles the hardship of incarceration patiently enough to come by its uplift honestly.

title: The Fall
description: A stuntman weaves a fantastical tale for a young girl in a 1920s hospital, blurring the lines between fiction and reality.
rt_quote: A stunningly beautiful and deeply imaginative film that deserves more attention.

title: Take Shelter
description: A man begins having apocalyptic visions and struggles to protect his family while questioning his own sanity.
rt_quote: Gripping and quietly devastating — a masterclass in psychological tension.

title: In Bruges
description: Two hitmen hide out in Bruges, Belgium, wrestling with guilt, violence, and their own strange dynamic.
rt_quote: Darkly funny and surprisingly heartfelt — a crime comedy unlike any other.

title: The Handmaiden
description: In 1930s Korea, a con man hires a maid to help seduce a wealthy heiress — but everything goes deliciously wrong.
rt_quote: Sumptuous and sly — a bold, erotic, and intricately plotted masterpiece.

title: Timecrimes
description: A man stumbles into a time machine and becomes entangled in a series of increasingly disturbing loops.
rt_quote: Smart and compact — a hidden gem for fans of tight sci-fi thrillers.

title: Columbus
description: In a small Midwestern town known for its modernist architecture, two strangers form a delicate emotional bond.
rt_quote: Visually serene and emotionally precise — a meditative indie debut worth discovering.

title: Leave No Trace
description: A veteran and his daughter live undetected in the forests of Oregon — until a small mistake changes everything.
rt_quote: Quietly powerful — an emotionally rich story of love, independence, and trauma.

title: The Man from Earth
description: A retiring professor reveals to his friends that he’s actually a 14,000-year-old immortal — and that’s just the beginning.
rt_quote: A low-budget sci-fi triumph that relies purely on story and ideas — captivating from start to finish.

title: I Origins
description: A molecular biologist’s research on the human eye leads him to startling discoveries about love, identity, and existence.
rt_quote: Ambitious, romantic, and thought-provoking — a film that dares to mix science with soul.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: After the D-Day landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
rt_quote: Gripping, powerful, and unflinching — Spielberg’s war epic redefined realism in combat filmmaking.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
description: After an encounter with a UFO, a man becomes obsessed with a vision that leads to a world-changing revelation.
rt_quote: A bold and beautiful sci-fi tale filled with wonder and Spielberg’s signature humanity.

title: The Fabelmans
description: A young aspiring filmmaker discovers the power of storytelling while navigating a turbulent family life in this semi-autobiographical tale.
rt_quote: Deeply personal and tender — Spielberg’s ode to cinema and the roots of creativity.

title: Moonstruck
description: A widowed woman finds herself falling in love with her fiancé’s passionate younger brother, upending her carefully ordered life.
rt_quote: A funny, warm-hearted tale with brilliant performances — Cher’s Oscar-winning turn is unforgettable.

title: Love Actually
description: Multiple love stories unfold in London during the holidays, exploring the highs and lows of romance and connection.
rt_quote: Messy but utterly charming — a holiday rom-com that wears its heart on its sleeve.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
description: A bumbling Englishman finds love — and personal growth — while attending a string of weddings (and one funeral).
rt_quote: Witty and heartfelt with standout performances — a rom-com classic with emotional depth.

title: Sleepless in Seattle
description: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio show to find his father a new wife, leading to a cross-country romance with destiny.
rt_quote: Charming, wistful, and endlessly romantic — Hanks and Ryan are magic.

title: Tootsie
description: A struggling actor disguises himself as a woman to land a role — but finds more than he bargained for in love and life.
rt_quote: Clever, heartfelt, and hilarious — Tootsie is more than just a gimmick; it's a landmark film.

title: Harold and Maude
description: An eccentric young man obsessed with death forms a life-changing bond with a wildly free-spirited elderly woman.
rt_quote: Offbeat and oddly beautiful — a cult classic that explores love beyond convention.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief leads a team into the subconscious minds to plant an idea in a target's mind.
rt_quote: Smart, innovative, and thrilling, Inception is that rare summer blockbuster that succeeds viscerally as well as intellectually.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress are drawn together by their common desire to do what they love. But as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.
rt_quote: La La Land breathes new life into a bygone genre with thrillingly assured direction, powerful performances, and an irresistible excess of heart.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: Years after the collapse of civilization, the tyrannical Immortan Joe enslaves apocalypse survivors inside the desert fortress the Citadel. When the warrior Imperator Furiosa (Charlize Theron) leads the despot's five wives in a daring escape, she forges an alliance with Max Rockatansky (Tom Hardy), a loner and former captive. Fortified in the massive, armored truck the War Rig, they try to outrun the ruthless warlord and his henchmen in a deadly high-speed chase through the Wasteland.
rt_quote: With exhilarating action and a surprising amount of narrative heft, Mad Max: Fury Road brings George Miller's post-apocalyptic franchise roaring vigorously back to life.

title: John Wick
description: Legendary assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) retired from his violent career after marrying the love of his life. Her sudden death leaves John in deep mourning. When sadistic mobster Iosef Tarasov (Alfie Allen) and his thugs steal John's prized car and kill the puppy that was a last gift from his wife, John unleashes the remorseless killing machine within and seeks vengeance. Meanwhile, Iosef's father (Michael Nyqvist) -- John's former colleague -- puts a huge bounty on John's head.
rt_quote: Stylish, thrilling, and giddily kinetic, John Wick serves as a satisfying return to action for Keanu Reeves -- and what looks like it could be the first of a franchise.

title: Die Hard
description: New York City policeman John McClane (Bruce Willis) is visiting his estranged wife (Bonnie Bedelia) on Christmas Eve. He joins her at a holiday party in the headquarters of the Japanese-owned business she works for. But the festivities are interrupted by a group of terrorists who take over the exclusive high-rise, and everyone in it. Very soon McClane realizes that there's no one to save the hostages -- but him.
rt_quote: Its many imitators (and sequels) have never come close to matching the taut thrills of the definitive holiday action classic.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions. Arms dealer John Lark and a group of terrorists known as the Apostles plan to use three plutonium cores for a simultaneous nuclear attack on the Vatican, Jerusalem and Mecca, Saudi Arabia. When the weapons go missing, Ethan and his crew find themselves in a desperate race against time to prevent them from falling into the wrong hands.
rt_quote: Fast, sleek, and fun, Mission: Impossible - Fallout lives up to the "impossible" part of its name by setting yet another high mark for insane set pieces in a franchise full of them.

title: The Dark Knight
description: With the help of allies Lt. Jim Gordon (Gary Oldman) and DA Harvey Dent (Aaron Eckhart), Batman (Christian Bale) has been able to keep a tight lid on crime in Gotham City. But when a vile young criminal calling himself the Joker (Heath Ledger) suddenly throws the town into chaos, the caped Crusader begins to tread a fine line between heroism and vigilantism.
rt_quote: Dark, complex, and unforgettable, The Dark Knight succeeds not just as an entertaining comic book film, but as a richly thrilling crime saga.

title: Gladiator
description: Commodus (Joaquin Phoenix) takes power and strips rank from Maximus (Russell Crowe), one of the favored generals of his predecessor and father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius, the great stoical philosopher. Maximus is then relegated to fighting to the death in the gladiator arenas.
rt_quote: While not everyone will be entertained by Gladiator's glum revenge story, Russell Crowe thunderously wins the crowd with a star-making turn that provides Ridley Scott's opulent resurrection of Rome its bruised heart.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
description: When Earth falls under attack from invincible aliens, no military unit in the world is able to beat them. Maj. William Cage (Tom Cruise), an officer who has never seen combat, is assigned to a suicide mission. Killed within moments, Cage finds himself thrown into a time loop, in which he relives the same brutal fight -- and his death -- over and over again. However, Cage's fighting skills improve with each encore, bringing him and a comrade (Emily Blunt) ever closer to defeating the aliens.
rt_quote: Gripping, well-acted, funny, and clever, Edge of Tomorrow offers entertaining proof that Tom Cruise is still more than capable of shouldering the weight of a blockbuster action thriller.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: Following the death of his wife, Los Angeles police detective Martin Riggs (Mel Gibson) becomes reckless and suicidal. When he is reassigned and partnered with Roger Murtaugh (Danny Glover), Riggs immediately clashes with the older officer. Together they uncover a massive drug-trafficking ring. As they encounter increasingly dangerous situations, Riggs and Murtaugh begin to form a bond. Riggs' volatile behavior might just help them apprehend the criminals -- if it doesn't kill them both first.
rt_quote: The most successful installment in a phenomenally successful series, Lethal Weapon helped redefine action movies for the 1980s and 1990s.

title: Skyfall
description: When James Bond's (Daniel Craig) latest assignment goes terribly wrong, it leads to a calamitous turn of events: Undercover agents around the world are exposed, and MI6 is attacked, forcing M (Judi Dench) to relocate the agency. With MI6 now compromised inside and out, M turns to the one man she can trust: Bond. Aided only by a field agent (Naomie Harris), Bond takes to the shadows and follows a trail to Silva (Javier Bardem), a man from M's past who wants to settle an old score.
rt_quote: Sam Mendes brings Bond surging back with a smart, sexy, riveting action thriller that qualifies as one of the best 007 films to date.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
description: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) continues his international quest to uncover his true identity. From Russia to Europe to northern Africa to the United States, he must stay one step ahead of those who would capture or kill him before he has a chance to discover the truth.
rt_quote: The Bourne Ultimatum is an intelligent, finely tuned non-stop thrill ride. Another strong performance from Matt Damon and sharp camerawork from Paul Greengrass make this the finest installment of the Bourne trilogy.

title: Superbad
description: High school seniors Seth and Evan have high hopes for a graduation party. The co-dependent teens plan to score booze and babes so they can become part of the in-crowd, but separation anxiety and two bored police officers complicate the pair's self-proclaimed mission.
rt_quote: Deftly balancing vulgarity and sincerity while placing its protagonists in excessive situations, Superbad is an authentic take on friendship and the overarching awkwardness of the high school experience.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: In the 1930s, the Grand Budapest Hotel is a popular European ski resort, presided over by concierge Gustave H. (Ralph Fiennes). Zero, a junior lobby boy, becomes Gustave's friend and protege. Gustave prides himself on providing first-class service to the hotel's guests, including satisfying the sexual needs of the many elderly women who stay there. When one of Gustave's lovers dies mysteriously, Gustave finds himself the recipient of a priceless painting and the chief suspect in her murder.
rt_quote: Typically stylish but deceptively thoughtful, The Grand Budapest Hotel finds Wes Anderson once again using ornate visual environments to explore deeply emotional ideas.

title: Bridesmaids
description: Annie (Kristen Wiig) is a single woman whose own life is a mess, but when she learns that her lifelong best friend, Lillian (Maya Rudolph), is engaged, she has no choice but to serve as the maid of honor. Though lovelorn and almost penniless, Annie, nevertheless, winds her way through the strange and expensive rituals associated with her job as the bride's go-to gal. Determined to make things perfect, she gamely leads Lillian and the other bridesmaids down the wild road to the wedding.
rt_quote: A marriage of genuine characters, gross out gags, and pathos, Bridesmaids is a female-driven comedy that refuses to be boxed in as Kristen Wiig emerges as a real star.

title: Groundhog Day
description: Phil (Bill Murray), a weatherman, is out to cover the annual emergence of the groundhog from its hole. He gets caught in a blizzard that he didn't predict and finds himself trapped in a time warp. He is doomed to relive the same day over and over again until he gets it right.
rt_quote: Smart, sweet, and inventive, Groundhog Day highlights Murray's dramatic gifts while still leaving plenty of room for laughs.

title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
description: Three dysfunctional co-workers embark on a mission to help their newfound friend lose his sexual innocence.
rt_quote: Steve Carell's first star turn scores big with a tender treatment of its titular underdog, using raunchy but realistically funny comedy to connect with adult audiences.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: Ferris Bueller (Matthew Broderick) has an uncanny skill at cutting classes and getting away with it. Intending to make one last duck-out before graduation, Ferris calls in sick, "borrows" a Ferrari, and embarks on a one-day journey through the streets of Chicago. On Ferris' trail is high school principal Rooney (Jeffrey Jones), determined to catch him in the act.
rt_quote: Matthew Broderick charms in Ferris Bueller's Day Off, a light and irrepressibly fun movie about being young and having fun.

title: School of Rock
description: Overly enthusiastic guitarist Dewey Finn (Jack Black) gets thrown out of his bar band and finds himself in desperate need of work. Posing as a substitute music teacher at an elite private elementary school, he exposes his students to the hard rock gods he idolizes and emulates -- much to the consternation of the uptight principal (Joan Cusack). As he gets his privileged and precocious charges in touch with their inner rock 'n' roll animals, he imagines redemption at a local Battle of the Bands.
rt_quote: Black's exuberant, gleeful performance turns School of Rock into a hilarious, rocking good time.

title: Napoleon Dynamite
description: In small-town Preston, Idaho, awkward teen Napoleon Dynamite has trouble fitting in. After his grandmother is injured in an accident, his life is made even worse when his strangely nostalgic uncle, Rico, shows up to keep an eye on him. With no safe haven at home or at school, Napoleon befriends the new kid, Pedro, a morose Hispanic boy who speaks little English. Together the two launch a campaign to run for class president.
rt_quote: A charming, quirky, and often funny comedy.

title: Crazy Rich Asians
description: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse -- Nick's disapproving mother.
rt_quote: With a terrific cast and a surfeit of visual razzle dazzle, Crazy Rich Asians takes a satisfying step forward for screen representation while deftly drawing inspiration from the classic -- and still effective -- rom-com formula.

title: The Hangover
description: Two days before his wedding, Doug (Justin Bartha) and three friends (Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis) drive to Las Vegas for a wild and memorable stag party. In fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing; nor can they find Doug. With little time to spare, the three hazy pals try to re-trace their steps and find Doug so they can get him back to Los Angeles in time to walk down the aisle.
rt_quote: With a clever script and hilarious interplay among the cast, The Hangover nails just the right tone of raunchy humor, and the non-stop laughs overshadow any flaw.

title: Interstellar
description: In Earth's future, a global crop blight and second Dust Bowl are slowly rendering the planet uninhabitable. Professor Brand (Michael Caine), a brilliant NASA physicist, is working on plans to save mankind by transporting Earth's population to a new home via a wormhole. But first, Brand must send former NASA pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey) and a team of researchers through the wormhole and across the galaxy to find out which of three planets could be mankind's new home.
rt_quote: Interstellar represents more of the thrilling, thought-provoking, and visually resplendent filmmaking moviegoers have come to expect from writer-director Christopher Nolan, even if its intellectual reach somewhat exceeds its grasp.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: Officer K (Ryan Gosling), a new blade runner for the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. His discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard (Harrison Ford), a former blade runner who's been missing for 30 years.
rt_quote: Visually stunning and narratively satisfying, Blade Runner 2049 deepens and expands its predecessor's story while standing as an impressive filmmaking achievement in its own right.

title: Arrival
description: Linguistics professor Louise Banks (Amy Adams) leads an elite team of investigators when gigantic spaceships touch down in 12 locations around the world. As nations teeter on the verge of global war, Banks and her crew must race against time to find a way to communicate with the extraterrestrial visitors. Hoping to unravel the mystery, she takes a chance that could threaten her life and quite possibly all of mankind.
rt_quote: Arrival delivers a must-see experience for fans of thinking person's sci-fi that anchors its heady themes with genuinely affecting emotion and a terrific performance from Amy Adams.

title: The Matrix
description: Neo believes that Morpheus, an elusive figure considered to be the most dangerous man alive, can answer his question -- What is the Matrix? Neo is contacted by Trinity, a beautiful stranger who leads him into an underworld where he meets Morpheus. They fight a brutal battle for their lives against a cadre of viciously intelligent secret agents. It is a truth that could cost Neo something more precious than his life.
rt_quote: Thanks to the Wachowskis' imaginative vision, The Matrix is a smartly crafted combination of spectacular action and groundbreaking special effects.

title: Gravity
description: Dr. Ryan Stone (Sandra Bullock) is a medical engineer on her first shuttle mission. Her commander is veteran astronaut Matt Kowalsky (George Clooney), helming his last flight before retirement. Then, during a routine space walk by the pair, disaster strikes: The shuttle is destroyed, leaving Ryan and Matt stranded in deep space with no link to Earth and no hope of rescue. As fear turns to panic, they realize that the only way home may be to venture further into space.
rt_quote: Alfonso Cuarón's Gravity is an eerie, tense sci-fi thriller that's masterfully directed and visually stunning.

title: District 9
description: Thirty years ago, aliens arrive on Earth -- not to conquer or give aid, but -- to find refuge from their dying planet. Separated from humans in a South African area called District 9, the aliens are managed by Multi-National United, which is unconcerned with the aliens' welfare but will do anything to master their advanced technology. When a company field agent (Sharlto Copley) contracts a mysterious virus that begins to alter his DNA, there is only one place he can hide: District 9.
rt_quote: Technically brilliant and emotionally wrenching, District 9 has action, imagination, and all the elements of a thoroughly entertaining science-fiction classic.

title: Ex Machina
description: Caleb Smith (Domhnall Gleeson) a programmer at a huge Internet company, wins a contest that enables him to spend a week at the private estate of Nathan Bateman (Oscar Isaac), his firm's brilliant CEO. When he arrives, Caleb learns that he has been chosen to be the human component in a Turing test to determine the capabilities and consciousness of Ava (Alicia Vikander), a beautiful robot. However, it soon becomes evident that Ava is far more self-aware and deceptive than either man imagined.
rt_quote: Ex Machina leans heavier on ideas than effects, but it's still a visually polished piece of work -- and an uncommonly engaging sci-fi feature.

title: Dune (2021)
description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to a dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of a precious resource in existence, only those who can conquer their own fear will survive.
rt_quote: Dune occasionally struggles with its unwieldy source material, but those issues are largely overshadowed by the scope and ambition of this visually thrilling adaptation.

title: Looper
description: In a future society, time-travel exists, but it's only available to those with the means to pay for it on the black market. When the mob wants to eliminate someone, it sends the target into the past, where a hit man known as a looper lies in wait to finish the job. Joe (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is one such hired gun, and he does his job well -- until the day his bosses decide to "close the loop" and send Joe's future self (Bruce Willis) back in time to be killed.
rt_quote: As thought-provoking as it is thrilling, Looper delivers an uncommonly smart, bravely original blend of futuristic sci-fi and good old-fashioned action.

title: Children of Men
description: When infertility threatens mankind with extinction and the last child born has perished, a disillusioned bureaucrat (Clive Owen) becomes the unlikely champion in the fight for the survival of Earth's population; He must face down his own demons and protect the planet's last remaining hope from danger.
rt_quote: Children of Men works on every level: as a violent chase thriller, a fantastical cautionary tale, and a sophisticated human drama about societies struggling to live.

title: Gone Girl
description: In Carthage, Mo., former New York-based writer Nick Dunne and his glamorous wife Amy present a portrait of a blissful marriage to the public; when Amy goes missing on the couple's fifth wedding anniversary, Nick becomes the prime suspect in her disappearance; the resulting police pressure and media frenzy cause the Dunnes' image of a happy union to crumble, leading to tantalizing questions about who Nick and Amy truly are.
rt_quote: Dark, intelligent, and stylish to a fault, Gone Girl plays to director David Fincher's sick strengths while bringing the best out of stars Ben Affleck and Rosamund Pike.

title: Prisoners
description: When two young girls go missing, one father takes matters into his own hands.
rt_quote: A harrowing and emotionally gripping thriller.

title: Se7en
description: When retiring police Detective William Somerset (Morgan Freeman) tackles a final case with the aid of newly transferred David Mills (Brad Pitt), they discover a number of elaborate and grisly murders. They soon realize they are dealing with a serial killer (Kevin Spacey) who is targeting people he thinks represent one of the seven deadly sins. Somerset also befriends Mills' wife, Tracy (Gwyneth Paltrow), who is pregnant and afraid to raise her child in the crime-riddled city.
rt_quote: A brutal, relentlessly grimy shocker with taut performances, slick gore effects, and a haunting finale.

title: Zodiac
description: Based on real events, a cartoonist becomes obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer.
rt_quote: A meticulous, haunting investigation into obsession.

title: Nightcrawler
description: A driven man blurs the lines between observer and participant in the world of crime journalism.
rt_quote: A chilling and darkly compelling character study.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: Disgraced financial reporter Mikael Blomkvist (Daniel Craig) finds a chance to redeem his honor after being hired by wealthy Swedish industrialist Henrik Vanger (Christopher Plummer) to solve the 40-year-old murder of Vanger's niece, Harriet. Vanger believes that Harriet was killed by a member of his own family. Eventually joining Blomkvist on his dangerous quest for the truth is Lisbeth Salander (Rooney Mara), an unusual but ingenious investigator whose fragile trust is not easily won.
rt_quote: Brutal yet captivating, The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo is the result of David Fincher working at his lurid best with total role commitment from star Rooney Mara.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: Jodie Foster stars as Clarice Starling, a top student at the FBI's training academy. Jack Crawford (Scott Glenn) wants Clarice to interview Dr. Hannibal Lecter (Anthony Hopkins), a brilliant psychiatrist who is also a violent psychopath, serving life behind bars for various acts of murder and cannibalism. Crawford believes that Lecter may have insight into a case and that Starling, as an attractive young woman, may be just the bait to draw him out.
rt_quote: Director Jonathan Demme's smart, taut thriller teeters on the edge between psychological study and all-out horror, and benefits greatly from stellar performances by Anthony Hopkins and Jodie Foster.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: While out hunting, Llewelyn Moss (Josh Brolin) finds the grisly aftermath of a drug deal. Though he knows better, he cannot resist the cash left behind and takes it with him. The hunter becomes the hunted when a merciless killer named Chigurh (Javier Bardem) picks up his trail. Also looking for Moss is Sheriff Bell (Tommy Lee Jones), an aging lawman who reflects on a changing world and a dark secret of his own, as he tries to find and protect Moss.
rt_quote: Bolstered by powerful lead performances from Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, and Tommy Lee Jones, No Country for Old Men finds the Coen brothers spinning cinematic gold out of Cormac McCarthy's grim, darkly funny novel.

title: Wind River
description: A wildlife tracker and an FBI agent investigate a murder on a Native American reservation.
rt_quote: A powerful, haunting thriller set in a chilling landscape.

title: Shutter Island
description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a remote psychiatric facility.
rt_quote: A visually haunting, mind-bending thriller.

title: The Babadook
description: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book manifests in their home.
rt_quote: A haunting, deeply emotional meditation on grief and fear.

title: Hereditary
description: After the family matriarch passes away, a grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.
rt_quote: One of the most unsettling and artfully crafted horror films in years.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family must live in silence to avoid blind monsters with acute hearing.
rt_quote: A nerve-shredding thriller that's both terrifying and tender.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
rt_quote: A terrifying and masterfully crafted haunted house tale.

title: It Follows
description: A teenager is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.
rt_quote: A refreshingly original, slow-burning horror experience.

title: The Witch
description: A Puritan family encounters forces of evil in the woods beyond their New England farm.
rt_quote: A chilling, atmospheric descent into religious paranoia and dread.

title: Midsommar
description: A couple travels to a rural Swedish village's fabled mid-summer festival and becomes trapped in a pagan cult.
rt_quote: A mesmerizing, unsettling journey into sunlit terror.

title: The Others
description: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.
rt_quote: A beautifully crafted, chillingly effective ghost story.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend and uncovers a disturbing secret.
rt_quote: A brilliantly unsettling and socially conscious thriller.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where sinister forces drive the father into violence.
rt_quote: An atmospheric, slow-building masterpiece of horror.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: In this adaptation of Jane Austen's beloved novel, Elizabeth Bennet (Keira Knightley) lives with her mother, father and sisters in the English countryside. As the eldest, she faces mounting pressure from her parents to marry. When the outspoken Elizabeth is introduced to the handsome and upper-class Mr. Darcy (Matthew Macfadyen), sparks fly. Although there is obvious chemistry between the two, Darcy's overly reserved nature threatens the fledgling relationship.
rt_quote: A breathtaking adaptation of an Austen classic, Pride & Prejudice may stray from its source but the timeless romance between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy is bewitching despite, or because, of it.

title: The Notebook
description: A young couple falls in love in the 1940s but are soon separated by social differences and fate.
rt_quote: You mentioned wanting something passionate — this timeless love story captures the beauty and ache of a once-in-a-lifetime romance.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: A stockbroker's meteoric rise to wealth is fueled by corruption, drugs, and unrestrained debauchery in this high-octane tale of greed and downfall.
rt_quote: Funny, self-referential, and irreverent to a fault, The Wolf of Wall Street finds Martin Scorsese and Leonardo DiCaprio at their most uninhibited—and electrifying.

title: Before Sunrise
description: Two strangers meet on a train and spend one evening exploring Vienna and falling in love.
rt_quote: You’re in the mood for something thoughtful — this quiet, dialogue-rich romance captures the magic of connection and fleeting time.

title: Call Me by Your Name
description: In 1980s Italy, a summer romance blossoms between a 17-year-old boy and an older graduate student.
rt_quote: You asked for something sensual — this coming-of-age romance is tender, sun-drenched, and aching with unspoken longing.

title: Silver Linings Playbook
description: After a stint in a mental institution, Pat meets Tiffany — a mysterious woman with problems of her own.
rt_quote: You're looking for something offbeat — this quirky romance finds beauty in broken people and second chances.

title: Carol
description: An aspiring photographer and an older woman fall in love in 1950s New York against societal expectations.
rt_quote: You wanted something tender — this beautifully restrained romance is full of stolen glances and quiet rebellion.

title: About Time
description: A young man discovers he can travel through time and uses the ability to find love and fix life’s mistakes.
rt_quote: You're in the mood for something feel-good — this romantic gem mixes time travel with deep warmth and everyday magic.

title: Titanic
description: Two young lovers from completely different backgrounds meet and fall in love on the ill-fated maiden voyage of the unsinkable R.M.S. Titanic.
rt_quote: A mostly unqualified triumph for James Cameron, who offers a dizzying blend of spectacular visuals and old-fashioned melodrama.

title: 500 Days of Summer
description: A nonlinear story of a young man who reflects on his failed relationship with a woman who didn’t believe in love.
rt_quote: You wanted something playful yet real — this offbeat romance dissects love and heartbreak with charm and honesty.

title: Paddington 2
description: Paddington the bear spreads joy and marmalade as he searches for the perfect gift and ends up in a wild adventure.
rt_quote: Paddington 2 honors the heart of the original and adds even more warmth and wit.

title: The Parent Trap (1998)
description: Identical twins separated at birth meet at summer camp and scheme to reunite their parents.
rt_quote: A charming family comedy with Lindsay Lohan in a star-making dual role.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
rt_quote: Visually stunning and emotionally resonant — Pixar at its finest.

title: The Sound of Music
description: A governess brings music and love to a strict family in Nazi-occupied Austria.
rt_quote: Sweeping, sentimental, and timeless — a musical triumph.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A young boy befriends a gentle alien stranded on Earth and helps him return home.
rt_quote: A heartfelt classic that captures the wonder of childhood and the power of connection.

title: Julie & Julia
description: The parallel stories of Julia Child’s rise to fame and a modern woman finding purpose through cooking.
rt_quote: A delightful dual portrait of passion and purpose — with plenty of butter.

title: The Intouchables
description: An unlikely friendship forms between a quadriplegic aristocrat and his spirited caregiver from the suburbs.
rt_quote: Hugely charming and unexpectedly powerful — a feel-good hit with soul.

title: Chef
description: A disgraced chef starts a food truck, reconnecting with his passion, culture, and his son while traveling across the country.
rt_quote: A flavorful and heartwarming ride — *Chef* serves up laughs and love in equal measure.

title: Amélie
description: A shy waitress in Paris decides to change the lives of those around her for the better.
rt_quote: A visual delight and heartwarming tribute to the joy of small gestures.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a mysterious spirit world and must find a way to save her parents.
rt_quote: A breathtaking masterpiece of imagination and emotional depth.

title: Inside Out
description: The emotions inside a young girl’s mind struggle to help her navigate a big move.
rt_quote: Inventive, heartfelt, and surprisingly profound — Pixar at its best.

title: Coco
description: A young boy ventures into the Land of the Dead to unlock his family’s musical legacy.
rt_quote: Vibrant, moving, and beautifully animated — a tribute to culture and family.

title: Toy Story 3
description: As Andy heads to college, Woody, Buzz, and the gang face an uncertain future.
rt_quote: Emotionally resonant and richly satisfying — a perfect sendoff to beloved characters.

title: The Iron Giant
description: A boy befriends a giant robot from outer space in 1950s America, teaching it what it means to be human.
rt_quote: A tender, underrated gem with powerful themes and emotional weight.

title: Matilda (1996)
description: A gifted girl uses her wit and telekinetic powers to stand up to her tyrannical parents and principal.
rt_quote: A smart, subversive, and endlessly entertaining family film.

title: WALL-E
description: In a distant future, a lonely trash-compacting robot discovers new purpose after meeting another robot named EVE.
rt_quote: Visually dazzling and emotionally rich — a bold achievement in animation.

title: Mary Poppins
description: A magical nanny brings discipline and delight to a London family with a spoonful of sugar.
rt_quote: Practically perfect in every way — an enchanting musical classic.

title: The Lego Movie
description: An ordinary LEGO figure is mistakenly identified as the most extraordinary person and joins a quest to save the universe.
rt_quote: A gleefully bonkers joyride packed with laughs, heart, and unexpected depth.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: Two young sisters discover magical creatures in the forest near their new countryside home.
rt_quote: A tender, slow-blooming classic that radiates innocence and wonder.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer must hunt the beast down.
rt_quote: Compelling, well-crafted storytelling and a landmark in suspense filmmaking.

title: Psycho
description: A secretary embezzles money and ends up at a secluded motel run by a disturbed young man under his mother’s domination.
rt_quote: Infamous for its shower scene and twist ending, Hitchcock's masterpiece continues to inspire fear and admiration.

title: Jaws
description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer must hunt the beast down.
rt_quote: Compelling, well-crafted storytelling and a landmark in suspense filmmaking.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A ragtag group of misfits—including a brash adventurer, a talking raccoon, and a tree-like humanoid—must band together to stop a cosmic threat after stealing a mysterious orb.
rt_quote: Guardians of the Galaxy is just as irreverent as fans of the frequently zany Marvel comic would expect — and just as funny, too.

title: Lord of the Rings - Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
rt_quote: Visually breathtaking and emotionally powerful, The Return of the King is a masterful conclusion to a landmark trilogy.

title: Pulpfiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
rt_quote: One of the most influential films of the 1990s, Tarantino's masterpiece is stylish, witty, and unapologetically bold.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
rt_quote: Hard-hitting, stylish, and brilliantly acted, Goodfellas is a classic of modern American cinema.

title: Star Wars
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire’s world-destroying battle station.
rt_quote: A landmark in cinema, Star Wars dazzles with its groundbreaking effects and enduring mythological storytelling.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
rt_quote: Groundbreaking visual effects and a terrifying sense of wonder make Jurassic Park a thrilling blockbuster classic.

title: Godfather Part 2
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
rt_quote: One of the rare sequels that outshines the original, The Godfather Part II is a chilling portrait of power, legacy, and corruption.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: From the heights of notoriety to the depths of depravity, John Forbes Nash Jr. experiences it all; as a mathematical expert, he made a discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim; but Nash soon finds himself on a painful and harrowing journey of self-discovery.
rt_quote: The well-acted A Beautiful Mind is both a moving love story and a revealing look at mental illness.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: A single father and his young son endure many hardships as the father strives to provide a better future for both of them.
rt_quote: Will Smith's heartfelt performance elevates The Pursuit of Happyness above mere melodrama.

title: Manchester by the Sea
description: A man returns to his hometown after the death of his brother and faces his painful past.
rt_quote: You're seeking something emotional — this drama unfolds slowly, with raw grief and complex humanity at its core.

title: Moonlight
description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and adulthood.
rt_quote: You're in the mood for something reflective — this poetic drama offers a tender, powerful portrait of self-discovery and vulnerability.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook's founding and the personal and legal battles that followed.
rt_quote: You wanted something sharp and tense — this drama peels back the genius and rivalry behind one of tech's biggest revolutions.

title: Room
description: Held captive for years, a woman and her young son finally escape and begin a difficult journey toward healing.
rt_quote: You're looking for something emotional — this powerful drama explores trauma, resilience, and a mother’s fierce love.

title: Her
description: A lonely writer develops an unexpected relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
rt_quote: You’re in the mood for something thoughtful — this dreamy drama blends sci-fi with soulful intimacy in a story about love and identity.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
description: Two friends navigate a decade-long relationship filled with flirtation, philosophical arguments, and the big question: can men and women just be friends?
rt_quote: Smart, funny, and touching — a genre-defining romantic comedy.

title: Notting Hill
description: A British bookseller's life changes when a famous American actress walks into his shop — and into his heart.
rt_quote: Sweet, self-aware, and wonderfully cast — a rom-com fantasy with wit and charm.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
description: A modern retelling of *The Taming of the Shrew* set in high school, where a rebellious girl meets her unexpected match.
rt_quote: Funny, sharp, and full of 90s charm — with breakout performances from its young cast.

title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
description: A Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek man and struggles to get her big, loud family to accept him.
rt_quote: Hilarious and heartfelt — a small film with a giant heart.

title: The Princess Bride
description: A farm boy becomes a legendary hero to rescue his true love in a tale full of pirates, giants, and miracles.
rt_quote: A perfect blend of wit, adventure, and romance — endlessly quotable and universally beloved.

title: Bridget Jones's Diary
description: Bridget Jones documents her messy love life and career woes, caught between two very different suitors.
rt_quote: Witty and relatable — anchored by Renée Zellweger’s irresistible performance.

title: Roman Holiday
description: A sheltered princess escapes her duties for a day of freedom in Rome, forming a fleeting romance with an American journalist.
rt_quote: Elegant and charming — Audrey Hepburn’s star-making role is timeless.

title: Clueless
description: A spoiled but well-meaning teen matchmaker learns about love and identity in this modern spin on *Emma*.
rt_quote: Smart, stylish, and hilariously quotable — a teen rom-com classic.

title: You've Got Mail
description: Two business rivals unknowingly fall in love via anonymous email exchanges, unaware of each other’s true identities.
rt_quote: A warm, modern fairy tale — Meg Ryan and Tom Hanks deliver effortless chemistry.

title: Romancing the Stone
description: A romance novelist is swept into a real-life adventure in the Colombian jungle when she tries to rescue her sister.
rt_quote: A swashbuckling romantic adventure with laughs and great chemistry.

title: Pretty Woman
description: A wealthy businessman hires a spirited escort for a week, leading to an unexpected romance that challenges their worlds.
rt_quote: Glossy, romantic, and made iconic by Julia Roberts’ radiant star power.

title: The Wedding Planner
description: A successful wedding planner finds herself falling for the groom of one of her biggest clients.
rt_quote: Despite its flaws, J.Lo and McConaughey bring undeniable charm to this sweet rom-com setup.

title: The Father
description: A man struggles with aging and memory loss as his world becomes increasingly fragmented.
rt_quote: You're looking for something intense — this drama offers a haunting and empathetic glimpse into the experience of dementia.

title: Lion
description: A man uses Google Earth to find his long-lost family, decades after being separated as a child in India.
rt_quote: You asked for something emotional — this true story is a heartfelt journey of loss, identity, and reunion.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something far more dangerous.
rt_quote: A daring, provocative film that explores identity and consumerism with unforgettable intensity and style.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
rt_quote: A searing, unforgettable Holocaust drama, Schindler’s List is a powerful reminder of the capacity for good in the face of unimaginable evil.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ but good intentions, who unwittingly influences several defining historical events in 20th-century America.
rt_quote: A heartwarming, poignant film that blends humor and drama through one man’s extraordinary life journey.

title: Born on the Fourth of July
description: The true story of Ron Kovic, a patriotic young man whose life is transformed after being paralyzed in the Vietnam War and who later becomes an anti-war activist.
rt_quote: A powerful and deeply moving portrait of one man's disillusionment, carried by a career-defining performance from Tom Cruise.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: A voyage to Jupiter with a sentient computer named HAL turns into a quest for understanding humanity’s place in the universe in this philosophical sci-fi masterpiece.
rt_quote: Visually groundbreaking and intellectually profound, Stanley Kubrick's sci-fi epic is a cinematic landmark that continues to influence generations of filmmakers.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his eccentric friend Doc Brown.
rt_quote: Inventive, funny, and flawlessly constructed, Back to the Future is a time-travel classic with heart and wit to spare.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
rt_quote: A genre-defying masterwork, Parasite is a thrilling, darkly comedic exploration of social inequality that cements Bong Joon-ho's status as a visionary filmmaker.

title: Zero Dark Thirty
description: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda leader Osama bin Laden following the September 11 attacks, and his ultimate death at the hands of Navy S.E.A.L. Team 6.
rt_quote: Gripping, intense, and meticulously crafted, Zero Dark Thirty is a powerful depiction of determination and moral complexity in modern warfare.

title: The Shape of Water
description: In a top-secret research facility during the Cold War, a mute janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature being held in captivity.
rt_quote: A visually stunning and emotionally resonant fantasy, The Shape of Water blends classic monster movie tropes with modern storytelling magic.

title: Whiplash
description: A young jazz drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his talents are mentored—and tormented—by an abusive instructor determined to push him to greatness.
rt_quote: Intense, exhilarating, and driven by powerhouse performances, Whiplash is a riveting exploration of ambition and artistic sacrifice.

title: Birdman
description: A washed-up superhero actor struggles to mount a serious Broadway play while battling his ego and attempting to reclaim his past glory.
rt_quote: A dazzling technical feat with biting satire and a career-best performance from Michael Keaton, Birdman soars as a singular cinematic experience.

title: Logan
description: In a bleak future where mutants are nearly extinct, an aging Wolverine and ailing Professor X must protect a young girl with powers strikingly similar to Logan's.
rt_quote: A bold, brutal, and emotionally resonant farewell to a beloved character, Logan transcends the superhero genre with raw humanity and depth.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
rt_quote: Tense, smart, and featuring outstanding performances, The Departed is a gritty modern crime thriller that earns its place among Scorsese’s best.

title: Hugo
description: Living in a Paris train station, an orphan boy who maintains the station’s clocks gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father, a broken automaton, and the origins of filmmaking.
rt_quote: Visually stunning and emotionally rich, Hugo is Martin Scorsese’s heartfelt tribute to the power and magic of cinema.

title: Raging Bull
description: The rise and fall of Jake LaMotta, a boxer whose violence and temper led him to the top of the ring but destroyed his personal life outside of it.
rt_quote: Uncompromising and deeply affecting, Raging Bull is a masterclass in filmmaking and acting, anchored by Robert De Niro’s powerhouse performance.

title: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran becomes a night-time taxi driver in New York City, where the decadence and sleaze fuel his urge for violent action.
rt_quote: Gritty, disturbing, and expertly crafted, Taxi Driver is a haunting portrayal of urban alienation, featuring a career-defining performance from Robert De Niro.

title: Braveheart
description: Tells the story of the legendary thirteenth century Scottish hero named William Wallace (Mel Gibson). Wallace rallies the Scottish against the English monarch and Edward I (Peter Hanly) after he suffers a personal tragedy by English soldiers. Wallace gathers a group of amateur warriors that is stronger than any English army.
rt_quote: Distractingly violent and historically dodgy, Mel Gibson's Braveheart justifies its epic length by delivering enough sweeping action, drama, and romance to match its ambition.

title: Apocalypto
description: The Mayan kingdom is at the height of its opulence and power but the foundations of the empire are beginning to crumble. The leaders believe they must build more temples and sacrifice more people or their crops and citizens will die. Jaguar Paw (Rudy Youngblood), a peaceful hunter in a remote tribe, is captured along with his entire village in a raid. He is scheduled for a ritual sacrifice until he makes a daring escape and tries to make it back to his pregnant wife and son.
rt_quote: Apocalypto is a brilliantly filmed, if mercilessly bloody, examination of a once great civilization.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
description: Based on David Grann's broadly lauded best-selling book, "Killers of the Flower Moon" is set in 1920s Oklahoma and depicts the serial murder of members of the oil-wealthy Osage Nation, a string of brutal crimes that came to be known as the Reign of Terror.
rt_quote: Enormous in runtime, theme, and achievement, Killers of the Flower Moon is a sobering appraisal of America's relationship with Indigenous peoples and yet another artistic zenith for Martin Scorsese and his collaborators.

title: The Motorcycle Diaries
description: Based on the journals of Ernesto 'Che' Guevara, the film chronicles the formative journey he took across South America with his friend Alberto Granado — a trip that would inspire his future political activism.
rt_quote: The Motorcycle Diaries is a beautifully filmed road movie with an endearing central performance by Gael García Bernal.

title: Past Lives
description: Childhood friends Nora and Hae Sung, deeply connected, are separated when Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Two decades later, they are reunited in New York for one fateful week as they confront notions of destiny, love, and the choices that shape a life.
rt_quote: A remarkable debut for writer-director Celine Song, Past Lives is a delicately bittersweet meditation on destiny, love, and the quiet reverberations of lost possibilities.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the dark lord Sauron.
rt_quote: Full of eye-popping special effects and featuring a pitch-perfect cast, The Fellowship of the Ring brings J.R.R. Tolkien's classic to vivid life — and sets the stage for an epic trilogy.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided Fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his legions of Isengard.
rt_quote: The Two Towers balances spectacular action with emotional storytelling, delivering another thrilling chapter in the epic Lord of the Rings saga.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
description: Neo, Morpheus, and Trinity continue their fight against the machines as they learn more about the Matrix and its deeper layers of control. As Zion prepares for a looming attack, Neo must choose between saving humanity and the one he loves.
rt_quote: Though its heady themes and ambitious visuals sometimes overreach, The Matrix Reloaded delivers dazzling action and deepens the franchise’s mythos.

title: The Matrix Revolutions
description: In the final chapter of the trilogy, Neo faces off against Agent Smith in a battle for both the real and virtual worlds. As Zion fights for survival, Neo journeys to confront the source of the machine world.
rt_quote: Though visually impressive and thematically ambitious, The Matrix Revolutions falls short of the original's innovation and emotional impact.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
description: Neo lives a seemingly ordinary life as Thomas Anderson in San Francisco until a new version of Morpheus helps him rediscover the truth about the Matrix. As memories resurface, Neo must choose once again whether to follow the white rabbit.
rt_quote: The Matrix Resurrections is a bold meta sequel that plays with legacy and love, though it struggles under the weight of its own ideas.

title: John Wick: Chapter 2
description: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been placed on his life, forcing him to fight his way through an international assassin's guild.
rt_quote: John Wick: Chapter 2 packs a brutal punch with even more stylish action and world-building than its predecessor.

title: John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum
description: With a $14 million bounty on his head, John Wick must fight his way out of New York City as he becomes the target of the world’s most ruthless hitmen.
rt_quote: John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum reloads the franchise with breathtaking stunts and even more jaw-dropping action.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, he must face a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe — and forces that turn old friends into foes.
rt_quote: John Wick: Chapter 4 stacks stylish set pieces atop a surprisingly thoughtful story to create one of the franchise’s best entries.

title: Dr. No
description: James Bond is sent to Jamaica to investigate the mysterious death of a fellow agent, uncovering a plot by the villainous Dr. No to disrupt the American space program.
rt_quote: Dr. No launches the Bond franchise with plenty of style, suspense, and quips — and a charismatic performance from Sean Connery.

title: Goldfinger
description: James Bond uncovers a plot by Auric Goldfinger to contaminate the U.S. gold reserve at Fort Knox and plunge the global economy into chaos.
rt_quote: Goldfinger is where James Bond really came into his own — it features one of 007's most famous lines, iconic gadgets, and an unforgettable villain.

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
description: Bond teams up with a Soviet agent to stop a megalomaniac who plans to destroy the world and create a new civilization under the sea.
rt_quote: With impressive stunts and chemistry between leads, The Spy Who Loved Me stands as one of Roger Moore’s strongest Bond entries.

title: The World Is Not Enough
description: James Bond must protect an oil heiress from a terrorist with a deadly vendetta, only to discover layers of deception and betrayal.
rt_quote: The World Is Not Enough offers sleek production and a solid performance from Brosnan, even if the plot feels overly familiar.

title: Casino Royale
description: In his first mission as 007, James Bond must defeat a dangerous terrorist financier in a high-stakes poker game while navigating his own emotional vulnerabilities.
rt_quote: Casino Royale strips Bond down to his raw core, delivering intense action and a grounded origin story that reinvents the franchise for a new era.

title: All About My Mother
description: After her son's tragic death, a grieving mother travels to Barcelona in search of the boy’s transgender father and reconnects with women who each face their own struggles.
rt_quote: All About My Mother is a passionate, vibrant drama that explores identity, love, and compassion with bold cinematic flair.

title: Talk to Her
description: Two men form an unusual bond while caring for two women who are in comas, leading to a complex meditation on love, communication, and solitude.
rt_quote: Talk to Her is an unconventional love story, full of nuance and beautifully rendered emotion.

title: Volver
description: Raimunda, a working-class woman, deals with the death of her husband, hidden truths, and a visit from the ghost of her mother in this vibrant tale of women across generations.
rt_quote: Volver is a vibrant and soulful tribute to women, featuring a luminous performance by Penélope Cruz.

title: Pain and Glory
description: A film director in decline reflects on his past loves, losses, and the creative process that shaped his life, blurring the line between memory and fiction.
rt_quote: Pain and Glory is a hauntingly beautiful meditation on creativity and redemption, powered by a career-best turn from Antonio Banderas.

title: The Skin I Live In
description: A brilliant but unhinged plastic surgeon experiments on a mysterious patient in his mansion, revealing a chilling tale of obsession, loss, and identity.
rt_quote: The Skin I Live In is a twisted, stylish, and disturbing descent into obsession and transformation.

title: The Insider
description: When a research chemist comes under personal and professional attack after he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco, a television producer must struggle to find a way to get the truth out.
rt_quote: Intelligent and well-acted, The Insider is a potent corporate thriller elevated by Russell Crowe’s restrained, powerful performance.

title: L.A. Confidential
description: In 1950s Los Angeles, three very different detectives investigate a series of murders with their own distinct methods, exposing corruption and scandal at the highest levels.
rt_quote: Stylish, smart, and well-acted, L.A. Confidential is a modern film noir with a razor-sharp script and breakout performances.

title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
description: Captain Jack Aubrey pushes his ship and crew to their limits during a chase across two oceans to capture a French warship during the Napoleonic Wars.
rt_quote: Master and Commander is an intelligent, gripping, and impeccably crafted naval adventure led by a commanding Russell Crowe.

title: Cinderella Man
description: The story of James J. Braddock, a once-promising boxer forced into retirement after breaking his hand, who stages a miraculous comeback during the Great Depression.
rt_quote: Cinderella Man is a powerful and heartfelt tale of determination, brought to life by Crowe’s moving performance and Ron Howard’s deft direction.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
description: A down-on-his-luck rancher agrees to escort a captured outlaw to the train that will take him to court — but the journey is more dangerous than he imagined.
rt_quote: With solid performances and a sharp modern take on the western, 3:10 to Yuma is a tense and compelling character-driven drama.

title: The Nice Guys
description: A grizzled enforcer and a bumbling private eye team up to solve the mystery of a missing girl and a dead porn star in 1970s Los Angeles.
rt_quote: Funny, stylish, and smart, The Nice Guys is a buddy comedy that fires on all cylinders, with great chemistry between Crowe and Gosling.

title: Noah
description: Noah is chosen by God to build an ark and save his family and the world’s animals from an apocalyptic flood — but faces profound moral dilemmas in doing so.
rt_quote: Darren Aronofsky's Noah is an ambitious and visually stunning biblical epic, elevated by Crowe's committed performance.

title: Romper Stomper
description: A gang of neo-Nazi skinheads in Melbourne clash with immigrants and spiral into chaos and betrayal. A brutal early look at hate and alienation.
rt_quote: Romper Stomper is a raw, disturbing debut that showcases Russell Crowe's fierce talent in an unforgettable role.

title: The Birds
description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small town, only to witness a series of bizarre bird attacks that escalate into a terrifying siege.
rt_quote: The Birds is a landmark in suspense filmmaking, showcasing Hitchcock’s masterful use of tension and visual terror.

title: Rear Window
description: A photographer confined to his apartment with a broken leg spies on his neighbors from his window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
rt_quote: Taut, absorbing, and brilliantly acted, Rear Window is one of Alfred Hitchcock's most stylish thrillers.

title: Vertigo
description: A retired detective suffering from acrophobia is hired to follow a mysterious woman, but the investigation spirals into obsession and heartbreak.
rt_quote: Vertigo is a dizzying, haunting tale of desire and illusion that stands as one of Hitchcock's greatest achievements.

title: North by Northwest
description: An advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by foreign spies and pursued across the country in a thrilling tale of mistaken identity.
rt_quote: North by Northwest is a quintessential Hitchcock thriller — stylish, witty, and packed with iconic moments.

title: Strangers on a Train
description: Two strangers meet on a train and casually discuss trading murders. One of them takes the idea seriously — and expects the other to follow through.
rt_quote: A provocative premise and stylish direction make Strangers on a Train one of Hitchcock's most compelling thrillers.

title: Spellbound
description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to uncover the truth — with dream imagery designed by Salvador Dalí.
rt_quote: Spellbound is a heady blend of romance and psychology that stands out for its unique visuals and Hitchcock's suspenseful direction.

title: Rebecca
description: A young bride is haunted by the memory of her husband’s first wife in their stately mansion, where the sinister housekeeper holds disturbing secrets.
rt_quote: Rebecca is a moody, atmospheric masterpiece that blends romance and dread to chilling effect.

title: Notorious
description: An American agent recruits the daughter of a convicted Nazi to infiltrate a group of Nazis in South America, sparking a dangerous romance and web of secrets.
rt_quote: Notorious is a seductive blend of romance and suspense, elevated by powerhouse performances from Cary Grant and Ingrid Bergman.

title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
description: A vacationing couple learns of a planned assassination and their child is kidnapped to keep them silent — leading to a tense rescue effort.
rt_quote: With memorable sequences and a haunting score, The Man Who Knew Too Much is vintage Hitchcock suspense.

title: To Catch a Thief
description: A retired cat burglar must prove his innocence when a copycat begins committing thefts in the French Riviera — while falling for a beautiful heiress.
rt_quote: To Catch a Thief is a breezy, elegant thriller that dazzles with its stars, style, and wit.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A man arranges the perfect murder of his wife — but the plan begins to unravel in surprising ways.
rt_quote: Dial M for Murder is an impeccably crafted chamber piece that builds tension with every turn.

title: The Fifth Element
description: In the 23rd century, a cab driver becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and its minions from destroying Earth.
rt_quote: Visually inventive and gleefully over the top, The Fifth Element is a unique sci-fi adventure that blends style, humor, and action.

title: Coherence
description: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.
rt_quote: Smart, original, and unpredictable, Coherence is a mind-bending low-budget sci-fi thriller that rewards close attention.

title: Annihilation
description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous expedition into a mysterious, mutating zone known as The Shimmer, where the laws of nature break down and transformation is inevitable.
rt_quote: Annihilation backs up its sci-fi visual wonders and visceral genre thrills with an impressively ambitious—and surprisingly strange—exploration of challenging themes.

title: Tropic Thunder
description: When the cast of a big-budget war movie is dropped into a real conflict zone, the pampered actors must become the soldiers they're pretending to be.
rt_quote: Tropic Thunder is a smart and subversive spoof of Hollywood's excesses, with a stellar comedic cast firing on all cylinders.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: Walter Mitty, a daydreaming photo editor, embarks on a real-world global adventure that rivals his wildest fantasies in pursuit of a missing image.
rt_quote: It doesn't lack ambition or visual dazzle, but The Secret Life of Walter Mitty fails to develop enough emotional depth to match its high concept.

title: Meet the Parents
description: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is a former CIA agent who puts Greg through a series of increasingly embarrassing and intense tests.
rt_quote: Meet the Parents is a laugh-out-loud comedy with enough heart to make the awkwardness feel sweetly human.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A reprogrammed Terminator is sent back in time to protect John Connor, the future leader of the resistance, from a shape-shifting assassin.
rt_quote: T2 features thrilling action sequences and ground-breaking visual effects that hold up decades later.

title: True Lies
description: A secret agent struggles to balance his covert life as a spy with his suburban family life — until both worlds collide during a global terror plot.
rt_quote: True Lies balances explosive action with big laughs, delivering peak '90s blockbuster energy.

title: Léon: The Professional
description: Léon, a professional assassin, reluctantly takes in a 12-year-old girl after her family is murdered and teaches her the art of killing.
rt_quote: Léon is stylish, tense, and emotionally resonant — with unforgettable performances from Reno and Portman.

title: Ronin
description: A team of former intelligence operatives is hired to steal a mysterious briefcase, but loyalties shift in a dangerous game of deception.
rt_quote: Ronin delivers smart espionage and some of the greatest car chases ever put to film.

title: The Raid: Redemption
description: A SWAT team becomes trapped in a high-rise controlled by a ruthless drug lord. To escape, they must fight their way out floor by floor.
rt_quote: A brutally efficient showcase of martial arts choreography and nonstop adrenaline.

title: L'Avventura
description: A woman’s disappearance during a Mediterranean boating trip leads to a strange and drifting search by her lover and best friend.
rt_quote: A landmark in modern cinema, L'Avventura challenged narrative norms with haunting imagery and emotional ambiguity.

title: 8½
description: A famous film director struggles with creative block and retreats into a stream of memories, fantasies, and surreal introspection.
rt_quote: Fellini's 8½ is a visionary masterwork about art, identity, and the creative struggle — timeless and endlessly influential.

title: Reservoir Dogs
description: After a botched diamond heist, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is an undercover cop.
rt_quote: Tarantino's stylish debut is a raw, violent, and endlessly quotable classic of independent cinema.

title: Kill Bill Vol. 1
description: A former assassin wakes from a coma and begins a quest for vengeance against her former colleagues.
rt_quote: Kill Bill is a stylish, skillful, and bloody revenge tale with a terrific performance from Uma Thurman.

title: Kill Bill Vol. 2
description: The Bride continues her vengeance quest, facing her toughest opponents yet, including Bill himself.
rt_quote: Vol. 2 adds more emotional depth and dialogue-heavy sequences that reveal the characters’ humanity.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: A group of Jewish-American soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders in German-occupied France.
rt_quote: A classic Tarantino twist on WWII — brutal, brilliant, and darkly funny.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.
rt_quote: Bold, bloody, and stylistically daring, Tarantino delivers another genre-defying epic.

title: I Am Legend
description: In a ravaged New York City, a lone survivor searches for a cure while fending off mutated creatures.
rt_quote: Anchored by Will Smith’s performance, I Am Legend is a tense and haunting tale of solitude.

title: Batman Begins
description: After training with a mysterious league, Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham to fight crime as Batman.
rt_quote: Christopher Nolan reinvents Batman with a grounded, gripping origin story.

title: Casino
description: In 1970s Las Vegas, a mafia associate runs a casino while navigating corruption, betrayal, and brutal power struggles.
rt_quote: Impeccably crafted and stylistically bold, Casino reteams Scorsese and De Niro for a dark dive into the glitzy criminal underworld.

title: Heat
description: A master thief and a relentless LAPD detective face off as a major heist threatens to destroy both their lives.
rt_quote: Heat reunites De Niro and Pacino in an electrifying, cerebral crime epic that blends action with intense character drama.

title: Awakenings
description: A doctor discovers a drug that brings catatonic patients temporarily back to life, leading to a profound human experience.
rt_quote: Awakenings is a deeply touching and human film, anchored by heartfelt performances from Robin Williams and Robert De Niro.

title: The Deer Hunter
description: Three friends from a Pennsylvania steel town are changed forever by their experiences during the Vietnam War.
rt_quote: A harrowing exploration of friendship, trauma, and war, The Deer Hunter remains a powerful cinematic achievement.

title: Cape Fear
description: A convicted rapist stalks the family of the lawyer who failed to keep him out of prison, seeking brutal revenge.
rt_quote: Martin Scorsese's Cape Fear is a tense, unnerving thriller elevated by De Niro's menacing performance.

title: Midnight Run
description: A bounty hunter is tasked with transporting a former mob accountant across the country while evading both the FBI and gangsters.
rt_quote: A smart, funny, and action-packed ride, Midnight Run proves De Niro's comedic chops in a dynamic buddy pairing.

title: The King of Comedy
description: An aspiring stand-up comic becomes obsessed with a talk show host, leading to a disturbingly desperate act to claim fame.
rt_quote: The King of Comedy is an uncomfortable, ahead-of-its-time satire with a mesmerizingly unhinged De Niro.

title: Scent of a Woman
description: A prep school student needing money agrees to look after a blind, retired Army lieutenant colonel, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
rt_quote: This is Al Pacino’s show, and he delivers a tour de force that won him his first Oscar.

title: Scarface
description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
rt_quote: An unrelenting portrait of excess, anchored by Pacino’s blistering performance.

title: Dog Day Afternoon
description: A man robs a Brooklyn bank to pay for his lover’s gender reassignment surgery, leading to a tense hostage situation.
rt_quote: A gripping, compassionate portrait of desperation — powered by Pacino’s ferocity.

title: Serpico
description: An honest cop battles corruption within the NYPD in this true story of whistleblower Frank Serpico.
rt_quote: A gritty, realistic tale of morality, bolstered by one of Pacino’s finest early performances.

title: Carlito's Way
description: A former drug lord tries to go straight after prison, but his past drags him back into crime.
rt_quote: Stylish and tragic, it’s a soulful crime saga with Pacino in peak form.

title: Insomnia
description: A weary detective travels to a northern town where the sun never sets to investigate a murder, grappling with his own moral failings.
rt_quote: A taut psychological thriller with standout performances from Pacino and Williams.

title: Unforgiven
description: Retired gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, seeking justice and confronting the ghosts of his past.
rt_quote: As both director and star, Eastwood strips the myth from the Western with poetic finality.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: Three gunslingers race against each other to find a fortune in buried Confederate gold.
rt_quote: A classic Western epic with unforgettable style, music, and one of Eastwood's most iconic roles.

title: Gran Torino
description: A bitter Korean War veteran forms an unlikely bond with his Hmong neighbors, finding a chance at redemption.
rt_quote: A fitting farewell to Eastwood’s tough-guy persona, delivered with grace and grit.

title: Million Dollar Baby
description: An underdog female boxer trains under a hardened coach, forging a deep bond and facing devastating choices.
rt_quote: A powerful, emotionally searing film with knockout performances and direction.

title: Dirty Harry
description: A tough San Francisco cop goes rogue to catch a sadistic killer, blurring the lines of justice.
rt_quote: Raw and riveting, it defined a new breed of anti-hero and action cinema.

title: Mystic River
description: Three childhood friends are reunited by tragedy, and a murder investigation reveals long-buried secrets.
rt_quote: A haunting, Oscar-winning drama with powerful performances and masterful direction.

title: Letters from Iwo Jima
description: The Battle of Iwo Jima is retold from the perspective of the Japanese soldiers who fought and died defending their homeland.
rt_quote: A profound war film that finds humanity in the enemy — beautifully directed and devastating.

title: A Fistful of Dollars
description: A nameless gunslinger manipulates two rival gangs in a lawless town, playing both sides to his advantage.
rt_quote: Lean, stylish, and iconic — the start of Eastwood’s legend as the Man with No Name.

title: High Plains Drifter
description: A mysterious stranger rides into a corrupt town and brings violent justice — with a supernatural edge.
rt_quote: A chilling and atmospheric Western that showcases Eastwood's flair for subversion.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
description: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and flees to Texas after the Civil War, seeking peace while being hunted.
rt_quote: One of the most humane and nuanced Westerns of its era — directed with heart and grit.

title: Star Wars: Episode V – The Empire Strikes Back
description: The Rebel Alliance faces off against the Empire in a dark and thrilling sequel, as Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training and Han Solo confronts danger on all sides.
rt_quote: Darker, deeper, and more emotionally resonant — the best Star Wars entry by far.

title: The Fugitive
description: Dr. Richard Kimble escapes custody to find his wife's killer, while a relentless U.S. Marshal closes in.
rt_quote: Taut and suspenseful, anchored by Ford’s urgency and Tommy Lee Jones’ Oscar-winning charisma.

title: Blade Runner
description: In a dystopian future, a blade runner hunts down rogue androids who may be more human than they seem.
rt_quote: Visually groundbreaking and philosophically rich, Blade Runner is a sci-fi masterpiece.

title: Witness
description: A detective hides in an Amish community to protect a young murder witness and finds unexpected peace and romance.
rt_quote: A unique blend of crime and quiet cultural drama, with Ford at his most soulful.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope
description: A farm boy joins a galactic battle against the evil Empire in a genre-defining adventure.
rt_quote: A rousing, crowd-pleasing epic that launched a universe of imagination.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
description: Indiana Jones sets off to rescue his kidnapped father and stop the Nazis from finding the Holy Grail.
rt_quote: A charming, witty ride with great chemistry between Ford and Connery.

title: Air Force One
description: When terrorists hijack Air Force One, the President fights back in this high-octane thriller.
rt_quote: A popcorn action classic with Ford delivering a commanding performance.

title: Patriot Games
