description: CIA analyst Jack Ryan becomes a target after thwarting a terrorist plot in London.
rt_quote: An intelligent action thriller that balances family drama with political intrigue.

description: The story of Jackie Robinson’s historic breaking of baseball’s color barrier, supported by team executive Branch Rickey.
rt_quote: A heartfelt sports drama elevated by strong performances and a sincere message.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
description: Born under unusual circumstances, Benjamin Button ages in reverse — growing younger as the world grows older around him.
rt_quote: An epic, affecting, and visually sumptuous meditation on time, love, and loss.

title: Panic Room
description: A mother and daughter take refuge in a high-tech panic room when burglars break into their home, triggering a tense standoff.
rt_quote: A stylish and claustrophobic thriller elevated by Fincher’s precision and Jodie Foster’s resolve.

title: The Game
description: A wealthy man receives a mysterious birthday gift that plunges him into a life-altering, psychological labyrinth of real and imagined threats.
rt_quote: Twisty and atmospheric, The Game is a cerebral thrill ride from start to finish.

title: Mank
description: Screenwriter Herman J. Mankiewicz struggles to finish *Citizen Kane* amidst political intrigue and personal demons in 1930s Hollywood.
rt_quote: Gorgeously crafted and richly acted, Mank is a cinephile’s deep dive into the creation of a classic.

title: Annie Hall
description: A neurotic comedian reflects on his failed relationship with the free-spirited Annie Hall in this witty, introspective romantic comedy.
rt_quote: Inventive, intelligent, and bittersweet — a landmark in modern romantic storytelling.

title: Manhattan
description: Set against the backdrop of 1970s New York, a TV writer navigates complicated relationships while grappling with his romantic ideals.
rt_quote: Visually stunning and emotionally complex — a bittersweet ode to a city and its discontents.

title: Hannah and Her Sisters
description: A story of three sisters navigating love, betrayal, and existential questions across two years of family gatherings.
rt_quote: Richly layered and warm-hearted, one of Allen’s most accessible and human works.

title: Crimes and Misdemeanors
description: Two intertwining stories explore moral consequence and existential doubt: a doctor facing exposure and a filmmaker chasing meaning.
rt_quote: Darkly philosophical and emotionally gripping — Allen at his most profound.

title: Midnight in Paris
description: A nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously transported to 1920s Paris every night, meeting literary and artistic legends.
rt_quote: Enchanting, clever, and wistful — a love letter to art, nostalgia, and the past.

title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
description: A lonely waitress in the Depression finds her life changed when a film character literally steps off the screen.
rt_quote: Inventive and poignant — a bittersweet fantasy that blends charm with melancholy.

title: Match Point
description: A former tennis pro climbs the social ladder through marriage, only to be ensnared in a love affair with dire consequences.
rt_quote: Cold, calculating, and sharp — a Hitchcockian turn into moral ambiguity.

title: Broadway Danny Rose
description: A small-time talent agent with a big heart gets tangled in a romantic mob misunderstanding while trying to help his client.
rt_quote: Funny, touching, and filled with heart — one of Allen’s most affectionate comedies.

title: Zelig
description: A mockumentary about Leonard Zelig, a man who can physically and socially blend into any group he’s around.
rt_quote: An imaginative and brilliantly executed satire — uniquely Allen in its concept and tone.

title: Bullets Over Broadway
description: A struggling playwright compromises his integrity to get his play produced — by letting a gangster’s girlfriend star in it.
rt_quote: A hilarious and biting take on the intersection of art and crime, full of razor-sharp dialogue.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: Decades after his service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, Maverick returns to train a new generation — and face his past.
rt_quote: A breathtaking sequel that outflies expectations and proves Cruise is still a top-tier star.

title: Jerry Maguire
description: After a crisis of conscience, sports agent Jerry Maguire starts his own agency with one loyal client and a new vision for success.
rt_quote: A smart, heartfelt crowd-pleaser that delivers laughs and emotion with equal punch.

title: Rain Man
description: A self-centered man discovers his estranged brother is an autistic savant, and the road trip they take changes both of them.
rt_quote: Emotionally resonant and powered by stellar performances from Hoffman and Cruise.

title: Magnolia
description: A mosaic of interconnected lives in Los Angeles reveals a tapestry of love, loss, and emotional catharsis.
rt_quote: Ambitious and operatic — with Cruise delivering one of the most intense performances of his career.

title: A Few Good Men
description: A Navy lawyer defends two Marines accused of murder, unraveling a high-level conspiracy in the process.
rt_quote: Sharp writing, powerhouse performances, and one of the most famous courtroom showdowns in film history.

title: Collateral
description: A taxi driver becomes the hostage of a contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit across Los Angeles.
rt_quote: A moody, muscular thriller with Cruise playing against type — cold and captivating.

title: The Last Samurai
description: An American military advisor embraces the samurai way while defending a fading culture in 19th-century Japan.
rt_quote: Epic and emotional, with stunning visuals and a soulful lead performance.

title: Minority Report
description: In a future where crimes are stopped before they happen, a detective becomes the target of the system he helped build.
rt_quote: A cerebral and thrilling sci-fi ride — Spielberg and Cruise at their best.

title: The Firm
description: A brilliant young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm — only to discover it’s hiding deadly secrets.
rt_quote: Gripping and slick — Cruise’s charisma meets Grisham’s page-turning suspense.

title: Top Gun
description: A talented but reckless fighter pilot enters an elite training program and learns about teamwork, love, and loss.
rt_quote: A slick, adrenaline-fueled icon of '80s cinema — and a star-making role for Cruise.

title: Interview with the Vampire
description: Told from a journalist’s perspective, a 200-year-old vampire recounts his transformation and tortured existence.
rt_quote: Stylish and melancholic — Cruise surprises as the decadent and deadly Lestat.

title: Moneyball
description: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane challenges baseball tradition by building a team based on analytics rather than star power.
rt_quote: Smart, compelling, and driven by one of Pitt’s most restrained and effective performances.

title: 12 Monkeys
description: In a dystopian future ravaged by disease, a convict is sent back in time to uncover the origin of the plague — but reality unravels.
rt_quote: A twisty, cerebral sci-fi mystery with a brilliantly manic performance from Pitt.

title: Troy
description: Set during the Trojan War, this epic tale follows Achilles, whose wrath and destiny shape the fate of kings and empires.
rt_quote: Visually stunning with grand battles — and Pitt brings charisma and fury to the legendary warrior.

title: Ocean's Eleven
description: Danny Ocean and his crew of elite specialists plan an elaborate heist of three Las Vegas casinos in one night.
rt_quote: Slick, stylish, and effortlessly cool — a breezy caper with top-tier star power.

title: Traffic
description: A multi-layered exploration of the drug trade, told through the perspectives of a Mexican cop, an American politician, and a recovering addict.
rt_quote: Ambitious and unflinching — a gripping, kaleidoscopic look at the human toll of drugs.

title: Erin Brockovich
description: A single mom becomes a legal crusader after uncovering a water contamination case against a major corporation.
rt_quote: Julia Roberts is a force of nature in this sharp, inspirational legal drama.

title: Contagion
description: A deadly virus outbreak triggers global panic, government response, and personal tragedy in this hyper-realistic medical thriller.
rt_quote: Eerily prescient and scientifically grounded — a tense, chilling look at a global health emergency.

title: Out of Sight
description: A suave bank robber and a sharp federal marshal fall for each other during a tense game of cat-and-mouse.
rt_quote: Slick, sexy, and smart — a masterclass in crime and chemistry.

title: The Informant!
description: A quirky executive becomes an FBI informant against his company — but can’t stop lying along the way.
rt_quote: A hilarious, oddball satire of greed, ego, and corporate America — with Matt Damon at his best.

title: Logan Lucky
description: Two brothers plan an elaborate heist during a NASCAR race — enlisting help from a jailed explosives expert.
rt_quote: Fun, fast-paced, and refreshingly offbeat — a blue-collar heist with charm.

title: Magic Mike
description: A veteran stripper mentors a young dancer while trying to transition out of the business and pursue his true aspirations.
rt_quote: Surprisingly insightful and stylish — a soulful look behind the glitz of exotic dancing.

title: Side Effects
description: A woman’s new prescription medication spirals into a deadly mystery involving deceit and psychological games.
rt_quote: Twisty and intelligent — a sharp thriller with a clinical edge.

title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
description: A woman’s stale marriage is disrupted by the arrival of her husband’s enigmatic friend who records women's secrets on tape.
rt_quote: Quietly groundbreaking — a raw, intimate film that changed the face of indie cinema.

title: The Revenant
description: After being mauled by a bear and left for dead, frontiersman Hugh Glass endures unthinkable hardships to track down the man who betrayed him.
rt_quote: Visually stunning and brutally immersive — a raw epic anchored by DiCaprio’s committed performance.

title: Babel
description: Four interwoven stories across Morocco, Japan, Mexico, and the U.S. explore the ripple effects of a single tragic event.
rt_quote: Ambitious and moving — a profound look at how language, pain, and compassion connect us all.

title: 21 Grams
description: Three strangers' lives collide following a tragic accident, in a nonlinear narrative that explores guilt, love, and the weight of the soul.
rt_quote: Bold and emotionally devastating — Iñárritu crafts a puzzle of pain with raw performances.

title: Amores Perros
description: Three gritty tales of love, betrayal, and desperation collide after a violent car accident in Mexico City.
rt_quote: A fierce, uncompromising debut — raw storytelling and social critique at its best.

title: Biutiful
description: A dying father and small-time criminal seeks redemption while caring for his children in the underworld of Barcelona.
rt_quote: Bleak but deeply humane — carried by Bardem’s haunting, Oscar-nominated performance.

title: Bardo, False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths
description: A renowned journalist returns to Mexico and embarks on a dreamlike exploration of identity, truth, and memory.
rt_quote: Ambitious, indulgent, and personal — a visually rich journey through the mind of the filmmaker.
